name: The Yoga Chick
text: In general, Mellow Mushrooms tends to be pretty gods. We visited this location while in town for my daughter‚Äôs birthday. I was super happy because they weren‚Äôt busy on a Saturday night. ‚Ä¶More

name: Bruce Murray
text: Very good pizza and salads. We had a half pepperoni and sausage, half artichokes and mushrooms. One of the best pizzas we have had in a long time. She also had a spinach and loved it. Service was fast and very friendly. Atmosphere was comfortable. Would definitely go again next time we are in Charleston.

name: Terri S
text: Went on a Saturday night after a day of shopping downtown.  Our server, Ava, was great, pizza was delicious and service was outstanding.  I would have given them 5 stars but they only had one tv working downstairs and during Saturday ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Cassidy
text: Cool place and great pizza. Our first waiter never showed at the table, although walked by us many times? 25 minutes in and after 2 times asking for a server so we could get a menu and water.. a different and equally busy server showed up ‚Ä¶More

name: AB
text: OMG,  YES,  all day every day!  Waitress was funny and adorable.  The food was amaaaaaazing.  Do eat here.

name: Sarah Youch
text: Delicious BBQ chicken pizza at a decent price, but a bit of a wait. Would recommend ordering ahead if getting take-out. Nice atmosphere and friendly, attentive, servers. Clean restaurant and interesting decor.

name: D Bramlett
text: Great pizza selection with a wide range of beers and liquor available. I had their gluten free crust, and it was actually really good. Our bartender was awesome and helpful with selecting beers we would enjoy.

name: K Mac
text: Love mellow pizza and calzones. A bit skimpy on veggies on our last pizza but great flavor.

name: Orielle M.G.
text: Food and service were simply amazing. The Holy Shitake pie was one of the best pizzas I've ever had. This is a must try if you're a pizza lover in the Charleston area.

name: Gil Weber
text: Great service with very good understanding and care for food allergies.  Really good pizza including those gluten free and dairy free folks in our group.

name: Evan Guthrie
text: The Mellow Mushroom on King Street in Charleston is one of my favorite places to go to for pizza or a snack. I like that there is a restaurant area on the first floor and more of a restaurant and bar on the second floor as each space has ‚Ä¶More

name: Tiara Bahn
text: My absolute favorite mellow mushroom. Maybe it's their chef but their food is better than the others we've been to. We drive an extra 25 minutes to eT at this one specifically

name: Beabea Beabea
text: Has something for everyone. I am vegan but my family are not. This place has delicious food for all of us that meets our specific diet. Never disappointed, always good food.

name: Shanna Rogers
text: Easily the worst mellow mushroom we've ever eaten at. Need more stoners in the kitchen to make their food taste better. We visited for our 5 year anniversary because we love MM in Raleigh area. This location was terrible. Bruchetta was soggy and tasted like they soaked their tomatoes in vinegar. Would not recommend this location.

name: Stephen Cann
text: Best pizza in the South, plus a fantastic beer selection, in two-story digs with brick walls and an upstairs bar. Highly recommend this place.

name: Ashley Montero
text: great pizza! however, at my most recent visit I ordered a large pie, and received a medium sized pizza in a large box.. after bringing this up to the manager, he did not credit me a free pie like I would have liked.

name: Hugo Gomez
text: Always love the decor and the vibes here. Pizza was good but not amazing. Prices are reasonable.

name: Andy Berman
text: Just has a horrific experience with Ava, the hostess. As I walked in, I requested for seating, Ava immediately shouted, ‚Äúit‚Äôs not my priority!‚Äù I was taken aback by her response as her job as a hostess is to seat customers coming in. When I ‚Ä¶More

name: Christian Moreno
text: It was good. They messed up my friends order but they didn't charge the food. Good customer service.

name: stuart richman
text: Great food selection at reasonable prices in a funky atmosphere with excellent service. Was my first time there and will definitely return again. I highly recommend it.

name: Brian Fatka
text: We ordered for pick up. They did gluten free really well, and the pizza was pretty good. We had the mighty meat - toppings were delicious. The crust was a little soft, but that is unfortunately common with gluten free. Regardless, it was good and safe, and we'd eat there again.

name: Fabricio Gomez
text: Very good pizza. Great service. Can never go wrong at Mellow Mushroom

name: Jacob Blankenship
text: Our experiences at Mellow Mushroom food wise have been very good. I have yet to go to one that has not been. However, our server was difficult to get a hold of when we needed things. My fiancee and I ordered a pizza a little while back from ‚Ä¶More

name: Igit Igit
text: Only had a beer, buth the host (Diane?) Was super friendly. Will definitely bring a pizza.

name: Johnathan Siebert
text: I usually don‚Äôt eat at chain restaurants, but will always make an exception for Mellow Mushroom. Actually I often seek out Mellow Mushroom when I‚Äôm in a new city because I love to see how each city chooses to theme out their restaurant. This particular location is one of my favorites and they always do a great job with the food.

name: Debbie Keller
text: Took forever to get our food and they weren't that busy.  Everyone got their food except one person and then the food was cold.  Calzone was barely warm on the inside and pizza was cold.

name: Isaac Goldszer
text: I love this chain but I‚Äôll be patronizing the West Ashley location from now on. Bar staff upstairs were incredibly friendly but when the downstairs crew got my order wrong it crashed the party.

name: Sean Bonner
text: Pretty overpriced now as the quality isn‚Äôt what it once was. You can justify any price when you are far beyond any competition but not when you are par with third place.

name: Brenna Lang
text: My husband and I typically love eating here because it's a great option for both of us to enjoy pizza (I can't have dairy and they have vegan cheese!) However, this was by far the worst experience I've ever had at a restaurant. When we ‚Ä¶More

name: Richard Call
text: I meet the most beautiful young lady who was so personable and enjoying with a huge beautiful smile.

name: Stephen Hunt
text: All locations are pretty solid. The Maui Wowie pizza may be the most original pizza I have ever come across. Never thought I would approve of pineapple and/or banana peppers on a pizza. Shock and awe.

name: Robert Morrison
text: Hard working staff which a very strong emphasize on customer service. Top notch pizza!

name: Claire Count
text: Always good. Always Quirky. Worked with my food tolerance. If this is for Charleston MM, they have a fun rooftop patio.

name: Don Kerrigan
text: The food was really good, as good as other mellow mushrooms I've been to. And it's nice that they have gluten free pizza. Was a little disappointed with the waitress. We were seated and ended up sitting there for quite a while before actually getting served. Once the waitress finally came to the table the service was great.

name: Tanya Barnby
text: Best pizza and artichoke spinach dip I've ever had , so yummy !

name: Michelle Birchfield
text: Loved this place! Chris the bartender was very personable.  Customer service at it's best and the food was DELICIOUS!

name: Tina Moss
text: Loved it. Service was a little slow,  but overall I'd for sure go back.

name: Vu Doan
text: Pizza was oval shaped and crust was stretched unevenly. Tasted okay but the service wasn't that great. Servers kept forgetting to bring drink orders

name: Ellen Bisch
text: Yikes! Stay clear from evil Ava. She should not be working in the service industry. Witnessed her screaming and cursing at customers.  Flagged her down a couple times for assistance and she blatantly ignored me. Much rather be ignored than terrorized as she did to those other customers. Scary!

name: Leila Carlisle
text: Always great. We visit with chris every time we are in town.

name: Gerardo D√≠az-M√©ndez
text: Fresh, delicious pizza and a very attentive and friendly waitress. Recommend this place to everyone!

name: Bradley
text: We had quite a large group and made reservations last minute. They were able to get us a table and the service was very good! The waitress was attentive, fast, and organized. Everyone got the correct food and we had no problems. The food ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Kennedy
text: Great food and drink at at great price.

name: Jared Bridwell
text: The food came in a timely manner, for being a pizza joint during a rush. Staff was helpful and knowledgeable on menu items, as well as suggested an easier alternative to ordering pizza and beer cheese, suggested the bites came with beer ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley Hamilton
text: Single handedly one of the best places I've ever had pizza. Great atmosphere, great people, even better food! All around a great experience.

name: John McRae
text: After we ordered lunch, we waited one hour for it.  Turns out the pizza was "overcooked"     Manager and server apologized profusely. And the pizza was comped.  Still, one wonders how this happened. My wife liked the pizza, though.

name: Dave Sexton
text: Food great an decorating very interesting.

name: jeanne b
text: nice lunch salads reasonably priced

name: Chase Austin
text: Service was chill and comfortable with an entire table of teenagers. Food quality was amazing and very well priced. Half of a large pizza fed all 3 of us (fairly large young men). Will be returning!

name: Boundless Transformations
text: Go here to get my Mellow Mondays going. They have a great $5 pizza deal that can fit anyone or family's budget. Highly recommend the one downtown because service is a lot faster.

name: Scott Platt
text: Pizza is good and reasonably priced for a single individual.  The host also seated me in a different location at my request, which included a seat near the window on the second floor with a great view of beautiful older buildings along King Street.

name: Peter Tran
text: I got the holy mushroom pizza. It was good. What knocked this down from 4 to 3 stars was that the wait took ~40minutes for a small pizza during an odd time of around 3pm on a monday.

name: Innocent Flame
text: This place has the greatest style.  Love it.  Smoothest lounge around.

name: Ian Turton
text: Cute. Nice place with good pizza. This chain of stores was new to me and I liked it. Would definitely go again. It's not that romantic of a place but it is fun and up beat. Good staff.

name: Sarah Farrell
text: Fun atmosphere and the best pizza! Great for groups and the employees are super friendly!

name: Tammy Wilson
text: Great pizza and atmosphere.

name: Heather Diekman
text: The food at Mellow Mushroom is always great! Vegan and vegetarian options are a plenty on the menu. This one had some of the best sweet tea I have had. Only suggestion, they were out of hand soap and couldn't find an employee to inform.

name: Caroline Simmons
text: Wow. Great pizza. Outstanding selection & quality. Our service was fantastic & we will be back for more

name: Javier Vega
text: We were visiting Charleston for the weekend and thought we should try out this location since we love the Savannah, Pooler and Summerville locations. We arrived about an hour and 15 minutes to close. There was a chalk sign that said please ‚Ä¶More

name: Nikisha Harrison
text: Best pizza and salad. Only pizza I can eat the crust.

name: Kimberly Scott
text: If I could give a lower rating, I most certainly would. There is a waiter by the name of Ryan (King Street location, Charleston SC) whom is extremely unprofessional, rude, sarcastic, and does not need to work in the service industry.

name: Curious Excitement
text: Crust is good....service subpar...there are handfuls of pizza places around these days...not wowed..but was good meal

name: BreAnna Davids
text: After 1hour 15 minutes, I called the site again, honestly concerned for the driver. Come to find out, the MANAGER told me he didn‚Äôt know why it they quoted me an hour, it should have been another 1hour 45 minutes, and that our order ‚Ä¶More

name: Tabi Baller
text: Food was good, service was very slow

name: Mary Flores
text: Great place to have pizza. Our server Ashley was very good attentive to Our needs and very nice. I had the veg out pizza delicious and the crust incredible.

name: Karsheika Gathers
text: Our waiter was so amazing and the food was delicious!

name: Terry Graham
text: Great food. Try the potato pizza. Sounds crazy right? Worth it. Awesome patio, great staff

name: Frederick Graham
text: Great pizza and service

name: Robert Harman
text: Pizza was the best in Charleston... definitely recommend it.. the one in Summerville.. mediocre..

name: Stephen Long
text: Convenient location on King St and very tasty pizza, but the upstairs is chilly. We waited about 40 minutes for a large pizza and 4 small pizzas when it did not seem busy. They do have gluten-free options, though.

name: India Barnes
text: We had the Chicken Lababdar, which was good - actually really good. Then we had naan chicken tikka/tandoor warp which was also good - nice smoky taste due to the naan being roasted in the tandoor. I would have given 5-stars, but they lose a ‚Ä¶More

name: Tausha Leach
text: Loved the food and our waitress,  some of the workers were not so pleasant though...

name: Rachel Smith
text: My favorite Mellow Mushroom location. Service is always prompt and friendly, the times that I‚Äôve gone they have never been overly busy, or crowded which I love. The servers are very knowledgeable about the food and even give great suggestions for beer ;)

name: Greg Luttrell
text: Great casual place with bar upstairs.  Lots of combinations for pizza and great appetizers.

name: Jade Lebeau
text: Very friendly, you can be indoors or outdoors.

name: Eric Zook
text: Food was great service was not stood at the door 15 min before greeted then once we got drinks didn't see server for 30 min and told the bar was backed up and there was nothing they could do about it. Being a manager at a restaurant I would never have told a table that had been there almost an hour there was nothing we could do.

name: Dina Enders
text:
Jack was a amazing at his job,Customer Service was as a 10, Jack was knowledgeable and friendly.
Pizza incredible.

name: Martha Baird
text: Fun atmosphere, friendly staff & good pizza make for great experience!

name: Jennifer Weber
text: Great food. Friendly service and dedicated allergy space.

name: Joanne Kirkham
text: I went into mellow mushroom and was quickly taken to a table. Too bad there was water pouring down from the ceiling. I was put at a different table where I sat for 25 minutes and watched people come and go but never stop to ask what we ‚Ä¶More

name: Patty Heindl
text: Service was terrible.  Most of the Waitstaff just sat in a booth in the front window.  Remaining wait staff couldn't keep up. Had to ask for drinks 3 times. Pizza came out before drinks and salad. Restaurant wasn't even busy at the time.

name: Brian Rowe
text: Excellent stop for pizza. Many vegetarian options. Fun spot for happy hour.

name: KimberLee Centeno
text: Our server Chris was incredible.  He even boxed up our leftovers and put them in the cooler for us to pick up after shopping.

name: Grim
text: The salad and a slice lunch is a steal

name: Aaron Lucash
text: Good as all the other locations.

name: Kevin
text: Upstairs is noisy, there are 7 or more televisions there. The waiter was great. The pizza was nice. I would like less cheese and longer cooking time to get the crust baked well.

name: Mandana Namiranian
text: Delicious vegan options üôåüèªüëçüèª

name: Matt The Gym Rat Gaming
text: Everything about mellow was good besides our waiter who was not in the best mode and did not treat us with the best service. The food and drinks were awesome but service was not.

name: Colton Johnson
text: Probably the best Mellow Mushroom that I've been to. They have all of the favorites and few things unique to just this location (did someone mention $5 car bombs everyday?.)

name: Avi Shah
text: 5 star from a former chicagoan, current New Yorker .. veganite too üòÖ  üòçü§©ü§óüòã #droolworthy ü§§

text: Great food and family atmosphere

text: Great pizza, great beer, great service

name: Jim Deel
text: We ordered a great white pizza and a build ypur own. We enjoyed them both. Service by Yetti was great also.

name: Rob Russo
text: Good food and reasonable prices. Hard to get seated but still a good place once seated.

name: Marcia Werner
text: Pizza is good, service is terrible. Consistently. We've been there 4 times now, it's been awful every time.

name: Lee Macho
text: two highlights amazing pizza and lots and lots and lots and lots of beer choices. if I have one suggestion for Mellow Mushroom please bring back your crumbled sausage sandwich because it's the reason I used to frequent this restaurant I ‚Ä¶More

name: HUGH E Long
text:
I called in an order to be picked up by me at 6pm!
I was told it would be ready in 25 minutes. Got there a little ahead of time! At 6:30 no pizza! At 6:45 got my pizza! ‚Ä¶More

name: Bob Firth
text: Had a great pizza. Ordered online, website worked well but had some problems backing up to correct order. Staff was very nice and friendly. I had walked there from the Bed and Breakfast where we were staying. A storm was approaching, ‚Ä¶More

name: Crystal Jordan
text: A vacation favorite for us!

name: Kelly Atkinson
text: Always a great place to gather with friends. It's an annual tradition for us after the Cooper River Bridge Run!

name: Troy Amadeus
text: Amazing pizza.  One of my favorites.  Highly recomend

name: Nathan Strutz
text: The downtown Mellow Mushroom is almost as good as the rest, but set conveniently on King St. Still though, MM is a local staple and consistently produces the best pizzas in the lowcountry.

name: elizabeth bulach
text: We sat at the table in the front window area. Well apparently the window was leaking and we sat in a puddle of water and our clothes got soaked. The hostess did not care at all and came off as annoyed when we told her about it. Our clothes ‚Ä¶More

name: Debbi Courtney
text:
Visited at 9:30pm on a Friday night. Restaurant was quiet. Staff was very nice and attentive. We had the white pizza. It was delicious.
The only negative comment is that the floors are extremely  slippery. One of our ‚Ä¶More

name: Saiquan Canty
text: I've eaten here several times and the customer service it is pretty good. Interesting atmosphere with the whole mushroom theme and the food is terrific.

name: destiny britt
text: Went to eat on Wednesday evening April 11th in the upstairs bar and had a young brown haired man as my bar tender. He was extremely attentive and cared to know if my friend and I liked each drink he made. He even went and found out for me ‚Ä¶More

name: Sameer Pai
text: Good pizza at a good price for the area. The selection of special pizzas isn't crazy but the options are definitely good. Would for sure go back.

name: Amany Asad
text: Service and all was extraordinary. Nice clean quiet place

name: John Belbot
text: Great food and a wonderfull waitress

name: ÂºµÂÆ∂Ë±™
text: it tastes good and fresh

name: Steven Riddei
text: The service started a little slow, but our server Raygen stepped it up and made for a very satisfying experience. The  GF pizza  was terrific as was the traditional crust. The beer offerings are great too. Definitely a great place to stop in for  a pint and some pizza

name: Harry Long
text: Good food. Mushroom soup is different but good. Take out order was slow to get ready

name: Madeline Grimm
text: Great pizza and service!!

name: tyler moss
text: Have been to this location many of times and I somehow have always had this super cute server named raygen. She always pays attention to details makes sure the food comes out hot and tasty every time. She is the sole reason for my many ‚Ä¶More

name: Ray Henderlong
text: Food was good. Service was great.

name: Mary Begley
text: We were visiting from Ohio during winter storm Grayson. Went to mushroom New Year's Day and had an awesome pizza and then storm hit two days later and we went back on Thursday when hours were limited and ordered items to take back to our ‚Ä¶More

name: Kirsten Alana Photography
text: A favorite since my days living in Charlotte. Decor here is not as cool as that location but the pizza is just as good as always. I order a create your own margherita with a drizzle of pesto. It's divine! Great beer selection too.

name: Laurel Smith
text:
Great ambience and great pizza.
Delish

name: Noah Holmes
text: Delicious pizzas and appetizers for a reasonable price. Not a place to go if you're in a hurry.

name: Max Nichols
text: We got delivery using Uber Eats and the food here was amazing. Would totally eat it again! We enjoyed the breadsticks, pretzel bites, and a custom medium pizza. Highly recommend!

name: Tom Caldwell
text: HORRIBLE SERVICE,  THE GIRL AT THE BAR NEVER ASK ABOUT MY MEAL. NEVER ASK IF I NEEDED SOMETHING MORE TO DRINK.

text: My appetizer came out with my meal, but was still great food, great service.

name: Jimmy Furr
text: Love the crust and pizza. Eat all the time. salads are great too

name: Danny Woodring
text:
Great food. Great service. Great atmosphere!
Addition: Jack was so cool!

name: Chucky 9558
text: We were quite impressed with both the food and the service. This was our second visit this week. It‚Äôs a great place for lunch and there is an impressive selection of craft beers.  Atmosphere is quite casual though but fun.

name: Charles R. Jones
text: The food was delicious. The service was excellent. üëçüëçüëç

name: Robert Bare
text: A great place to eat, good food and not too crowded on a Saturday at lunch time. The wait for our food was long but that may have had to with being part of a large group.

name: Jocylin Pierro
text: Great crust and service! Had a tempeh hoagie and cheese calozone. Both were delicious

name: michael buxton
text: we have gone to several mellow mushrooms throughout the southeast. they are all great! the bartender was especially helpful in showing local IPA beers that are brewed in the Charleston area. he doubled up and was our waiter too! outstanding.

name: Bridget
text: Love how easy it is to get vegan options here, and the service was great.

name: Gloria Mort
text: Enjoyed good quality little pricey but you get what you pay for

name: Luximar Arenas Petty
text: We absolutely loved this place. Nice atmosphere and my hubby liked that he could eat and watch the World Cup.

name: Ed
text: My wife and I were born and raised in NYC. I've lived off of pizza and little else, had it in Brooklyn, Queens, Manhattan etc. THIS PIZZA THO. I wish they shipped the Holy Shiitake Pie up to New York. DEFINITELY check out the Mellow ‚Ä¶More

name: Jim Chlebus
text: At home we have an awesome independent pizza place. Mellow mushroom takes the place in my heart. Great pizza. Frest toppings. Best crust we've ever had. Wish we had a MM at home.

name: Aaron Daniels
text: Friendly staff and funky atmosphere. Decent beer selection. Vegan pizza is a tricky thing: theirs is good, but suffers from the abundance of standard vegan cheese that may be tasty when hot, but soon becomes less appealing. For non-vegans, lots of delicious-looking choices.

name: Ander Worthy
text: Amazing pie, service and atmosphere is great efficient service and pleasant staff

name: Jennifer Sebelist
text: First time here at Mellow Mushroom. I was very excited, but ended up being very dissappointed. When our waitress first handed us plates, 3/5 of the plates were not clean at all. In fact, it looked like someone had squirted mustard all over ‚Ä¶More

name: Deb Clare
text: Generally like Mellow Mushroom, but this place was different. Food was definitely sub-par, air conditioning was way too high, music choice was hip-hop/rap even though majority of customers were middle aged or older (I asked them to change ‚Ä¶More

name: Annastacia Davis
text: Liked the food.

name: Payton Neely
text: Large beer selection and game day with pretzel bites and beer cheese dip

name: Sunjum Mehta
text: The food was awesome. We got the veg out and it was pretty good. It had a great atmoshphere, and the servers were really nice.

name: jessica rodgers
text: Cool up stairs . but not really

name: Valerie Scott
text: Good food but not forthcoming with fees for delivery.  $10 calzone cost me $20 because I didn't know there was a delivery fee and was generous with the tip.

name: Tony Smith
text: Cool place to get some food while down town

name: Gary Saunders
text: A Mellow experience and had the table overlooking King Street but in air conditioned comfort. Great food.

name: Deb Hyson
text:
Yum!
Nothing more or less.
Fantastic pizza and wings ‚Ä¶More

name: Jasper Glaser
text: I love the Psychedelic style of the place. Verry nice service. Cool atmosphere. Good music. And amazing pizza.

name: Anaya Waugh
text: Whilst deciding upon a space for dinner my College of Charleston associates and I happened upon the mellow mushroom on king due to its proximity to campus and it's more casual environment. I placed a call to the establishment more than 24 ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Anderson
text: Servers are great and very friendly. Atmosphere is relaxed, excellent music. Pizza was very tasty. Would come here again.

name: Donni McCutcheon
text: Very friendly service and great food!

name: Fred Ruddock
text: This is the first Mellow Mushroom in Charleston. I liked it and the others more before the corporate office began mandating the menu and beer club. They still have great food but they are losing their funky vibe.

name: Jeremy Prince
text: Upstairs bar is a must when Chris is behind bar doing work! Amazing service and pizza is bomb!

name: Adisha Blackmon
text: Pizza omg greatness

name: Jenny Riser
text: Delicious assortment of pizzas. Everyone found something that they wanted to eat. Groupon runs specials from time to time to help with the costs of menu but even without that its not too overly priced. Yuppi-Hipster place so if you do not like that kind of atmosphere, it is probably best to find a different place to hang out.

name: Matthew Kluk
text: Superb pizza and salad! I would go back again for sure.

name: Joyce Becwar
text: Great food. Lots of choices,  there were delicious choices for a vegan, a diabetic and everyone else in our party. Service is good. Proce is reasonable.

name: Joni German
text: Oh my gosh the food is incredible! From the pizza to the calzone to the hoagie, everything was delicious and the portions were huge! So good...

name: Susan Hollingsworth
text: Walked by at late-lunchtime so we stopped in. Very friendly & prompt service from all the young men  working there. Decor took us back to the 60's. Two good lunches: spinach salad & a slice, and half hogie w/out cheese - excellent! Would go back.

name: Kelly Creech
text: This place is always wonderful. Great service, delicious food.

name: Richard Scott
text: Great food! Would have given 5 stars, but the eating area is so close to the kitchen, they need to keep the A/C turned down cooler so it's not so hot.

name: Mika Katrov
text: Chill vibes, friendly staff, and great food! Not too crowded too

name: Brandi Welch
text: Loved the decor, the cheese bread was okay but 2 halfway through my 1st piece of pizza I was running to go throw up. It was awful! And the sad thing is, is that I've always liked the other Mellow Mushrooms I've ate at. This one, never again!!!

name: Laura Van Duivendyk Daniels
text: Great service. Very friendly. The mega veggie pizza is an awesomely fresh slice that can be made super vegan. Nice upbeat vibe and great for lunch.

name: Karen Smith
text: Good good good pizza!

name: Russ
text: I loved the easy going atmosphere, the waitress Erica was incredibly nice and very knowledgeable about the menu, and whole experience made my date and I very comfortable. Would definitely go back!

name: Sherone Rogers
text: I'm from New Jersey and Mellow Mushroom has the best pizza I've ever had down South. Their dough is great, lots of offbeat toppings  (the Kosmic Karma is awesome! ), and a really cool, funky atmosphere. Definitely worth a visit!

name: Rosa Acosta
text: Our experience was excellent. The food was great the service was great and the prices were very reasonable. But what I am satisfied the most with is the fact that one of my daughters accidentally left her phone on the booth. The next time ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael McGraw
text: S  L. O. W. but great food + service

name: Chuck Eliason
text: Funky joint with awesome pie

name: Brandon Perry
text: Beer selection could be better.

name: Brad Marshall
text: Great food

name: M Miller
text: Great pizza on the rooftop deck!

name: nathaniel h
text: Great pizza place. Wide ranging menu with delicious pizza crust

name: J P Blum
text: Great waitress...decent food

name: Hunter Scott
text: Always great, and the fresh, high quality ingredients at least make you feel like it's healthy. Also, always very clean.

name: Rob L
text: Great pizza. Family friendly atmosphere.

name: Roger Walk Jr.
text: Excellent pizza and bread sticks. Great customer service.  Always a staple when we come to Charleston.

name: Ryan Guskiewicz
text: Staff friendly and accommodating. Food good. Convenient location for before or after shopping.

name: Elizabeth Sheckler
text: Pizza is delicious; lots of options. Very accommodating to big groups. Friendly wait staff.

name: Kohn Ward
text: Ordered a 16" Kosmic Karma and a chocolate chunk cookie.  Pizza was really delicious, will order it again.  The 4 stars reflects that the cookie was over baked and a delivery charge of 2 bucks wasn't disclosed when I placed my order.

name: Dillon White
text: Had a great experience at this Mellow Mushroom.  Anna was my server, she was very attentive and sweet. Will be back soon!

name: Dennis Simmons
text: Awesome pizza and service..

name: Kathryn Dupuis
text: Amazing pizza! The crust is fantastic, and their specialty pizzas are creative and delicious. The atmosphere is very laid back.
